has research problem: extracting multiple entity-relations from an input paragraph

has research problem.from sentence: The state-of-the-art solutions for extracting multiple entity-relations from an input paragraph always require a multiple-pass encoding on the input.

This paper proposes a new solution that can complete the multiple entity-relations extraction task with only one-pass encoding on the input corpus, and achieve a new state-of-the-art accuracy performance, as demonstrated in the ACE 2005 benchmark.
Relation extraction (RE) aims to find the semantic relation between a pair of entity mentions from an input paragraph.
